idea-plugin.name: Jakefile
idea-plugin.description:
Syntax highlighting for Jakefile and .jake modules/files.

Website | Repository

Features

  • Syntax highlighting for Jakefile and *.jake files
  • Comment toggling
  • Bracket matching

Highlighted Elements

  • Keywords: task, file, import, as
  • Directives: @if, @else, @each, @end, @needs, @require, @cache, @watch, @confirm, @group, @desc, @alias, @quiet, @ignore, @only-os, @platform, @cd, @shell, @export, @pre, @post
  • Variables: {{variable}}, {{function(arg)}}, $VAR, ${VAR}
  • Functions: dirname(), basename(), extension(), uppercase(), lowercase(), trim(), home(), env(), exists()
  • Strings: Double and single quoted strings
  • Comments: # comment
